channel.title: Commentaries on The Thousand Kingdoms
channel.description: Recent content in Commentaries on The Thousand Kingdoms

item.title: 0.1.1 Vision
item.description: Well here we go… I wanted to include some chapter by chapter commentary as I write these, but didn’t want facetious or unnecessary author’s notes, nor did I want them to be attached to the chapters directly. Think of this as the purely optional director’s comment track. And, to be fair, I will spoil the chapters as I see fit, so read those first. When I started this story, I had a couple goals in mind.
